column5: A Happy New Year to all of us OFC'ers, Chase those bigguns and your dreams, best wishes and fishes for 2018.
To you as well Bunk and to everyone else Pumped for 2018 as it’s a trip year for my group. Only 237 days until we fly into Ogoki Lake w Ogoki Lake outfitters Cheers Gordy
Yes, Happy New Year. Good health and good times to all.
Happy New Year to you too Drew and everyone else as well.
Back at ya red beard. Looks like 2018 is off to a great start for us here as far as hard water. All the best all.
Happy new years ofcers!!!  To health and happiness!!!!
happy New Year to all. Nice dinner with family and expecting the kids and their kids at 4 today! The lamb will be done in the oven this year!
Yes Happy New Year to you, also all OFC'ers...
Same to you Drew and family and all the great people here on the OFC
